attributes.action: Change the law on overhanging trees and make the tree owner responsible for costs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: vote for a change in the law, to make tree owners responsible for removing overhanging trees, and the cost of doing so from neighbouring properties, and make it a case of trespass if the owner does not remove the overhanging after a request to do so from the victim.
